name: Slayaway Camp 2600
description:
My Submission to the Retro Game Jam, 

Slayaway Camp is a demake of the classic Puzzle game titled the same name, i thought the game would be more interesting if it was set in the Atari 2600 console, It has some cheeky references to some of the older Atari games thrown in as well, bringing some inspiration much in the same vein the original games did to it's 80's slasher flicks, i choose to add some references in to such old games like "Halloween" or "Texas Chainsaw Massacre" for the Atari 2600,

Plot:

You play as Skullface on your quest to kill teenagers who decided to wander into your campground.
